Package org.optaplanner.core.api.score.constraint

Explain a Score with ConstraintMatchTotal and ConstraintMatch.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConstraintMatch
    Retrievable from ConstraintMatchTotal.getConstraintMatchSet().
    ConstraintMatchScoreComparator Deprecated
    If you need this, it is trivial to implement via Comparator.comparing(Function).
    ConstraintMatchTotal
    Explains the Score of a PlanningSolution, from the opposite side than Indictment.
    ConstraintMatchTotalScoreComparator Deprecated
    If you need this, it is trivial to implement via Comparator.comparing(Function).
    Indictment
    Explains the Score of a PlanningSolution, from the opposite side than ConstraintMatchTotal.
    IndictmentScoreComparator Deprecated
    If you need this, it is trivial to implement via Comparator.comparing(Function).
    IndictmentScoreTotalComparator Deprecated
    If you need this, it is trivial to implement via Comparator.comparing(Function).
